siteMetadata.title: Tigran Hakobyan's personal blog
siteMetadata.subtitle: Long-form thoughts on building software, developer tools and remote work.

frontmatter.title: 🏝 Remote Work “Office Hours”
frontmatter.description: Today I’m excited to announce my new initiative - Remote Work “Office Hours.” I will be dedicating 2-3 hours every week (20 min time slots) to answer your questions about working remotely as a developer. It’s completely free and aims to help everyone who wants to learn more about remote work.
